longDef.en: used as the subject of a verb to refer to a group including the speaker and at least one other person

examples.en: Can we all go to the swimming pool this afternoon?
examples.cn: 我们今天下午能都去游泳吗？

examples.en: If you don't hurry up we'll be late.
examples.cn: 你不抓紧的话我们就要迟到了。

longDef.en: used by a speaker or a writer to refer to themselves and the people listening or reading
longDef.cn: （讲话者或作者用来指代自己与听众或读者）我们

examples.en: In today's lecture, we will be exploring the world economic situation.
examples.cn: 在今天的讲座上，我们要探讨世界经济形势。

longDef.en: used as the subject of a verb to refer to all people, especially when considered as a group
longDef.cn: （用作动词的主语）所有人;（尤指作为一个整体的）我们

examples.en: This planet on which we all live should be cherished and not exploited.
examples.cn: 我们生活的这个星球应该受到珍爱，而不该被掠夺。

longDef.en: used as the subject of a verb to mean "you", especially when talking to a child or someone who is ill
longDef.cn: （用作动词的主语，用于对孩子或病人说话时）你，你们

examples.en: We don't want to be late for school, do we?
examples.cn: 你不想上学迟到，对不对？

examples.en: "How are we this morning, Mrs Flanagan?" said the doctor.
examples.cn: “你今天上午感觉怎么样，弗拉纳根太太?”医生说道。

longDef.en: used by a queen or king when speaking officially to mean "I"
longDef.cn: （女王或国王在正式场合使用）朕，寡人
